text:
The MCU Phase 4 is delayed as a whole. Captain Marvel 2 is officially announced!

-Black Widow: 11/6/2020
-Eternals: 2/12/2021
-Shang-Chi: 5/7/2021
-Doctor Strange 2: 11/5/2021
-Thor 4: 2/18/2022
-Black Panther II: 5/6/2022
-Captain Marvel 2: 7/8/2022

entity.description: Thor: Love and Thunder is scheduled to be released in the United States on July 8, 2022, as part of Phase Four of the MCU.
